Uses of Class
eventmanager.GameEvent

  • Packages that use GameEvent 
    Package Description
    eventmanager  
    main  

    • Uses of GameEvent in eventmanager

      Subclasses of GameEvent in eventmanager 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AsteroidEvent
      An Asteroid event damages the ship in a GameEnvironment by a random scaled amount to it's shield.
      class  ItemFindEvent
      ItemFindEvent gives a random item from the planet's loot table to the crew.
      class  MoneyFindEvent
      MoneyFindEvent gives a random amount of money to the crew.
      class  NullEvent
      NullEvent represents the GameEvent of nothing happening.
      class  PiratesEvent
      PiratesEvent takes a targetItem from the Crew's Inventory if their inventory is empty the event does nothing.
      class  ShipPartFindEvent
      ShipPartFindEvent adds the Planet ShipPart to the Crew's Inventory.
      class  SpacePlagueEvent
      SpacePlagueEvent gives a random crew member the PLAGUED effect and a random amount of damage.
      Methods in eventmanager that return GameEvent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameEvent NullEvent.createEvent(java.util.Random randomGenerator, GameEnvironment env) 
      abstract GameEvent GameEvent.createEvent(java.util.Random randomGenerator, GameEnvironment env)
      Creates clone event of the same type with random event members.
      GameEvent AsteroidEvent.createEvent(java.util.Random randomGenerator, GameEnvironment env) 
      GameEvent ShipPartFindEvent.createEvent(java.util.Random randomGenerator, GameEnvironment env) 
      GameEvent PiratesEvent.createEvent(java.util.Random randomGenerator, GameEnvironment env) 
      GameEvent MoneyFindEvent.createEvent(java.util.Random randomGenerator, GameEnvironment env) 
      GameEvent SpacePlagueEvent.createEvent(java.util.Random randomGenerator, GameEnvironment env) 
      GameEvent ItemFindEvent.createEvent(java.util.Random randomGenerator, GameEnvironment env) 
      GameEvent GameEventManager.getRandomEvent(GameAction action, java.util.Random randomGenerator, GameEnvironment env)
      Method returns a random event from a action group of events.
      Method parameters in eventmanager with type arguments of type GameEvent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GameEventManager.setActionEvents(GameAction action, WeightedArrayList<GameEvent> events)
      Should be run on startup sets the events associated with a GameAction.

    • Uses of GameEvent in main

      Methods in main that return GameEvent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameEvent GameEnvironment.explorePlanet(CrewMember crewMember)
      Runs CREW_EXPLORE events and returns on applicable ones.
      GameEvent GameEnvironment.moveForwardADay()
      Increases daysPassed and activates DAY_START events.
      GameEvent GameEnvironment.travelToPlanet(CrewMember crewMemberA, CrewMember crewMemberB, Planet planet)
      Change current planets checking for events and reducing crew member's action points.
